channel.title: [PI] Godsword animations help needed : D
channel.description: Hey guyyys, so im usin galkons edit of the original project insanity client, but as stated by him, the godsword animations were removed, so when i equip any of them, the char holds it as a long sword (default stance) and walking is just sliding around. How do i add these animations?
